text: the question is why on day one on Monday
didn't the Prime Minister give us the
full picture that is the question and I
answered that question which is that
people have been attacking his father
who spent this is about his statement on
Monday this is about what he said
nothing to do with what his father did
no I think it is entirely about his
father because the whole focus of
people's attention has been this
particular investment trust that was set
up by his father in which he held some
units which were sold in 2010 that is
what the whole story is about is this
investment trust that his father set up
and I think that the Prime Minister's
natural instinct as a son was to try and
protect the reputation of his father who
is dead and not able to defend himself
from attacks from the press which only
come not because of anything that his
father did but because his son has
become prime minister so that was his
natural human reaction now he probably
might himself wish that he had been more
forthcoming about all of the detail on
that very first day but I think that
most people will say is not a it's not a
terrible human instinct to want to
protect your dad and his reputation well
they also want to know I've let you talk
for a very long time what you're doing
is you're conflating two things which I
don't think most people in ordinary life
are doing they're not talking about his
father he had a right to make the money
he did no one's talking about that what
they're interested in is why as I think
you for the first time alluded to a
second ago why the Prime Minister didn't
tell us straight up straight away what
he knew and I think you have just said
that that was a mistake what I just said
is that it's an entirely human reaction
to want to protect your father because
people aren't accusing him as that led
him that is what led him to bat away the
initial inquiries as a private matter
because he knew that he had paid all of
the UK tax due on any investment that he
held or that his wife held or that it
was in his name he knew that and he
thought this is a private matter I've
dealt with my tax affairs I paid all of
the tax that his due and I'm not having
people inquiring into
my father's passed in as a stockbroker
okay
